name: Mahjong Exotic
description:
Lose perspective of time and place, while playing a classic Mahjong Solitaire game! Visit dreamy worlds, see exotic creatures, while swamped in the different music themes, enjoying casual game play! Begin your journey and become the Ultimate Exotic Mahjong Master!
See this game in action!

We bring you:

- Cute graphics!
- Many unique levels!
- Themed music and sounds for every world!
- Combo system for bonus scores!
- Achievements for skills and patience!

What should you have in mind?

- Play fast to reach the top of the leaderboards!
- Be patience and complete all the achievements!
- We always appreciate our players feedbacks, so feel free to share your thoughts.

Features:

- 4 exciting environments – Australia, Serengeti, India, Madagascar
- 4 different tile sets – Australia, Serengeti, India, Fruits
- Gorgeous graphics
- Original sound effects and relaxing music
- Game Centre support

Do you want to be on top of the world?
Do you have a passion for adventure?
Do you like to visit new and exciting places?
Well, you have to solve our puzzles first!

We at Zariba would like to express our gratitude to all of our fans and supporters! If you like our game, please, rate it in the App Store!
Thank you!
